world.entity

Class Bullet

  • java.lang.Object
    • world.entity.Entity
      • world.entity.Bullet

  • public class Bullet
extends Entity
    A Class of Bullets extending entities Involving also a ship.
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Tom Sydney Kerckhove & Xavier Goas Aguililla

      A variable registering the maximum amount of time a bullet can bounce off the boundaries of the world.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Bullet

        public Bullet(Ship ship)
       throws java.lang.NullPointerException
        Initializes a new bullet.
        Parameters:
        ship - The ship which has fired this bullet.
        Effect:
        Initializes this new bullet using the properties of the given ship.
            this.super(ship.getDirection(), ship.getPosition(), ship.getSpeedLimit, initialVelocity, new CircleShape(radius), new Mass(shape.getRadius() * density));
            setShooter(ship);
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - [CAN] The given ship is null.

      • getBounceCounter

        @Basic
@Raw
public byte getBounceCounter()
        Returns the the amount of times this bullet has bounced on a worlds edge of this bullet.

      • canHaveAsBounceCounter

        @Basic
@Raw
protected boolean canHaveAsBounceCounter(byte bounceCounter)
        Checks whether this bullet can have the given bounceCounter as its bounceCounter.
        Parameters:
        bounceCounter - The bounceCounter to check.
        Returns:
        True if and only if the given bounceCounter is positive.
            result = (bounceCounter > 0)

      • setBounceCounter

        @Basic
@Raw
public void setBounceCounter(byte bounceCounter)
                      throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Sets the bounce counter of this bullet to the given bounce counter.
        Parameters:
        bounceCounter - The new bounce counter for this bullet.
        Postcondition:
        If this bullet can have the given bounce counter as its bounce counter, then the bounce counter of this bullet is now equal to the given bounce counter.
            if canHaveAsBounceCounter(bounceCounter)
             then new.getBounceCounter() == bounceCounter
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - [CAN] The given bounceCounter is not a valid bounce counter
            !canHaveAsBounceCounter(bounceCounter)

      • collideWith

        public void collideWith(Asteroid that)
        Has this Bullet collide with the given Asteroid.
        Overrides:
        collideWith in class Entity
        Parameters:
        that - The given Asteroid to collide with.
        Effect:
        Terminate both this bullet and the given asteroid
            that.terminate()
            this.terminate()

      • collideWith

        public void collideWith(Bullet that)
        Has this Bullet collide with the given Bullet.
        Overrides:
        collideWith in class Entity
        Parameters:
        that - The given Bullet to collide with.
        Effect:
        Terminate both this bullet and the other one.
            this.terminate()
            that.terminate()

      • collideWith

        public void collideWith(Ship that)
        Has this Bullet collide with the given Ship.
        Overrides:
        collideWith in class Entity
        Parameters:
        that - The given Ship to collide with.
        Effects:
      • If this bullet was shot by the given ship, don't do anything.
      • Otherwise Terminate both this Ship and the given bullet.
            this.terminate()
            that.terminate()

      • collideWith

        public void collideWith(Border that)
        Has this Bullet collide with the given Border.
        Overrides:
        collideWith in class Entity
        Parameters:
        that - The given border to collide with.
        Effect:
        Has this bullet bounce against the given border.
